name: Download yesterday's performance data from LinkedIn Ads to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description:
This template downloads LinkedIn Ads performance stats for yesterday into a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

The template is downloading this data:
Date, Account, Campaign, Impressions, Clicks, Costs, Conversions, Click Conversions, View Conversions

This means that you need to create a Google Sheets spreadsheet with these columns BEFORE you start configuring the template. Once you have the spreadsheet ready, you can start the template setup process.

The template is scheduled to run daily at 8 am.
